dsOverview.title: Japan Radiosonde Observations and Surface Observations, 1961-1997

summary.p: The Japanese Meteorological Agency has provided upper-air and surface observations for Japanese stations. Daily upper-air data are available at 6-hourly and 12-hourly intervals for the years from 1981 to 1997. Monthly upper-air data are available back to 1961. Daily surface observations at 3-hourly intervals span the period from 1961 to 1989, and the period from 1990 to 1997 is covered by hourly surface data.
